channel.title: [closed]
channel.description:
Im using TrisidiaX V3 as a server base, and ive modded everything to my liking and what not. But when you login it has a default message that pops up on the chat box. Does anyone know how/where i can find the file to edit it/delete it?
Ive attached the message to this.

item.title: [closed]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Search for the dialogue case in your DialogueHandler class. Then, look for whatever dialogue case number it is in your Client class in the initialize method.

Read full topic
